title: 5 invisible AI features in modern luxury cars that drivers rarely notice
description: Modern luxury cars quietly rely on artificial intelligence to improve safety, comfort, and convenience without drawing attention to the technology itself. Rather than flashy automation, many AI systems work silently in the background, monitoring drivers, predicting risks, and personalising the driving environment. These hidden capabilities are becoming a defining feature of premium vehicles, shaping how people experience mobility every day.Image Credit: Canva
